ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities in the osu repository include enhancements to the gameplay test feature, such as pausing playback when entering gameplay test from the editor, addressing issues and incorporating pull requests to refine the functionality.

ppy/s3-nginx-proxy.summary: The s3-nginx-proxy repository has seen updates focused on preserving upstream Cache-Control headers, with recent push and pull request events aimed at refining the handling of these headers to enhance overall performance and compatibility.
